summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of student routine tracking app. All UI functionality works correctly, but critical localStorage persistence issue found that prevents data from surviving page refresh.

critical_bugs.issue: Data not persisting after page refresh - localStorage gets overwritten with empty arrays during component initialization
critical_bugs.impact: All user data (subjects, tasks, schedule) is lost on page refresh, making the app unusable for real-world scenarios
critical_bugs.technical_details: useEffect hooks that save to localStorage run before data loading useEffect completes, overwriting saved data with initial empty state

passed_tests: Dashboard loads with three stat cards (Completed Tasks, Study Sessions, Upcoming Classes)
Enable Reminders button requests notification permission
Subjects tab: Add new subject with name, description, and spaced repetition toggle
Subjects tab: Edit existing subject functionality
Subjects tab: Delete subject functionality
Subjects tab: Display subjects with spaced repetition badge
Tasks tab: Add new task with name, description, due date calendar, and reminder toggle
Tasks tab: Mark task as complete/incomplete using checkbox
Tasks tab: Edit existing task functionality
Tasks tab: Delete task functionality
Tasks tab: Display tasks with reminder badge and due dates
Schedule tab: Add new class with name, instructor, day, start/end time, location
Schedule tab: Edit existing class functionality
Schedule tab: Delete class functionality
Schedule tab: Display classes with day badge and time
Statistics update: Completed tasks count updates when tasks are marked complete
Statistics update: Study sessions and upcoming classes counts update correctly
UI/UX: Clean minimal design with light colors and proper spacing
UI/UX: Responsive design works on desktop (1920x1080), tablet (768x1024), and mobile (390x844)
Toast notifications appear for all CRUD operations
Glass card effects with backdrop blur working correctly
Inter font family loaded properly
Light gradient background as specified
Hover effects and animations working
All interactive elements accessible on mobile devices
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical localStorage persistence issue: The useEffect hooks that save data to localStorage are running before the data loading useEffect completes, causing saved data to be overwritten with empty arrays. Need to modify the timing or add conditions to prevent saving empty state during initial load.
